definition: Dartsendo, Dardo or Kangding county (Tibetan: dar mdo rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Kangding County is located in the transition area between the west hilly edge of Sichuan Basin and the Tibetan Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 康定縣地處四川盆地西緣山地及青藏高原過渡地帶。
